TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InkCanvasGestureEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection strokes, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> gestureRecognitionResults) cil managed
Public Sub New (strokes As StrokeCollection, gestureRecognitionResults As IEnumerable(Of GestureRecognitionResult))

Docs.summary: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Cancel { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Cancel : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: 取得或設定布林值，這個值表示是否要將筆劃視為筆勢。
Docs.value: 如果筆劃是筆墨，則為 ; 如果筆劃是筆勢，則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>事件發生時，值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性相依於第一個<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>所傳回的集合中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A>方法。 如果值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.ApplicationGesture%2A>屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture>，或者如果它是筆勢其<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A>以外是值<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence.Strong>，然後<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A>是`true`。 否則，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A> 為 `false`。 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A>是`false`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>新增<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Strokes%2A>至其<xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>。 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.Cancel%2A>是`true`，筆劃不會加入至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> GetGestureRecognitionResults() cil managed
Public Function GetGestureRecognitionResults () As ReadOnlyCollection(Of GestureRecognitionResult)

Docs.summary: 從筆勢辨識器傳回結果。
Docs.returns: 可能成為的應用程式筆勢集合。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 所傳回的集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A>方法依照<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A>可能會傳回的集合<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>物件具有下列值：
|索引|ApplicationGesture|RecognitionConfidence| |-----------|------------------------|---------------------------| |0|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Check>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence.Strong>| |1|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence.Intermediate>| |2|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Curlicue>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence.Poor>| |3|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.DoubleCurlicue>|<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence.Poor>|
這表示，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>就很可能是可辨識的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>核取記號，可能會相當的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>中不鍵筆勢，和完全不可能，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>花體或 double 花體。
> [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasGestureEventArgs.GetGestureRecognitionResults%2A>方法可以傳回的陣列<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture>具有較高程度的<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>比它具有的其他應用程式的筆勢。 這表示很有可能，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>不鍵筆勢，而不是具有較低的軌跡<xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>。

Docs.summary: 取得用來表示可能筆勢的筆劃。
